\n

trans-unit.source:
\n

Formats the error message that is displayed when range validation fails.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

\n

The formatted error message.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Checks that the value of the data field is in the specified range.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxxx xx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The data field value to validate.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxxxx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if the specified value is in the range; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xx xxx xxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
